title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 664.10 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 664.10 - Severability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part shall be severable, and if
any clause, sentence, paragraph, subdivision, or any other provision of this

Part shall be adjudged invalid by a court of competent jurisdiction, such order
or judgment shall be confined in its operation to the controversy in which it
was rendered, and shall not affect or invalidate the remainder of any provision
of any section or the application of any part thereof to any other person or
circumstance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
664.10

Adopted

New

York State Register December 31, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 53, eff. 1/1/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
